# SampleConfs - NPCs & Dialogues

Config files related to NPCs, dialogues, drama system, and character interactions.

## Drama System
- **DramaCondition.json** - Drama trigger conditions
- **DramaDialogue.json** - Dialogue definitions
- **DramaFunctionGroup.json** - Function grouping
- **DramaModel.json** - Drama models
- **DramaNpc.json** - NPC drama configs
- **DramaOptions.json** - Dialogue options
- **DramaTrigger.json** - Drama triggers

## NPC Core
- **NpcBase.json** - Base NPC definitions
- **NpcCondition.json** - Spawn conditions
- **NpcSpecial.json** - Special NPCs
- **SpecificNpcCreate.json** - Specific NPC creation

## NPC Heroes & Legends
- **NpcHeroes.json** - Hero NPCs
- **NpcHeroesParn.json** - Hero parameters

## NPC Attributes & Stats
- **NpcInitAttrGrow.json** - Attribute growth
- **NpcInitAttrTend.json** - Attribute tendencies
- **NpcInitCharacter.json** - Character traits
- **NpcInitFeature.json** - Features
- **NpcInitHobby.json** - Hobbies
- **NpcInitMoney.json** - Starting money
- **NpcInitParameters.json** - Initialization parameters

## NPC Skills & Abilities
- **NpcInitSkill.json** - Initial skills
- **NpcImmortSkill.json** - Immortal skills
- **NpcImmortValue.json** - Immortal values

## NPC Grades & School Assignment
- **NpcInitGradeSchool.json** - School grade initialization
- **NpcInitGradeTown.json** - Town grade initialization

## NPC Appearance
- **NpcFavouriteLooks.json** - Favorite appearance styles

## NPC Names
- **NpcNameFirst.json** - First names
- **NpcNameLast.json** - Last names

## NPC Behaviors
- **NpcFortuitous.json** - Random encounters
- **NpcLunaticCount.json** - Lunatic behavior counts

---

**Total:** 30+ files
